content.title: Welcome to the Arkasa Cluster, Survivor!
content.text:
Here, you’ll find everything you need to get started and thrive in our world. 
All the important info, such as Discord links, server rates, and  commands, is available for you to explore. 
Whether you're looking to connect with the community or need specific details about the server settings, this is your hub for it all.

If you have any questions or need help, feel free to reach out to our players or team. We're here to support your survival journey!

content.title: Server info
content.text:
Server Name:[Arkasa] CrossPlay PvE | 3x XP, 5x Gather/Tame, 15x Maturation | No-Wipe

Rates

150 Wild Dino Level
Harvesting x5
XP x3
Taming x5
Mating x5
Maturation x15
Player and Flyer speed leveling is enabled

content.title: rules
content.text:
1 Respect for Other Players: Treat all players with respect. Bullying, discrimination, and the use of offensive language are prohibited.

 2 No Griefing: Destroying or damaging other players' structures, tames, or possessions is not allowed.

 3 Land Claiming: Do not build too close to other players without their permission. Maintain a reasonable distance to avoid limiting their expansion space.

 4 No Blocking Caves: Do not block access to caves. Ensure that caves remain accessible to all players for resource gathering and exploration.

 5 Taming Etiquette: Leave tames that other players are in the process of taming alone. Do not interfere with their taming process.

 6 Fair Trade and Economy: Be fair in trade transactions. Scamming or deceiving other players is not allowed.

 7 Server Events: Respect the rules and guidelines for any server events. Collaborate with other players and make the event enjoyable for everyone.

content.title: SERVER DETAILS
content.text:
XP: x3
Gather: x3
Taming: x5
Breeding: x5
Maturation/Gestation/Egg Hatch: x15
Max Dino Level Wild: 150
Unlimited Respecs
Open to all for imprinting
Auto-unlock engrams while leveling
Speed-leveling for players and flyers
Custom stacks
Reduced Food/Stamina/Water Drain (Multiplier=0.5)
Player Health Recovery Multiplier: 2
Resource Respawn Period Multiplier: 0.5

content.title: PLAYER STATS ADJUSTMENTS
content.text:
Health: Increased from 1 to 1.5
Stamina: Increased from 1 to 2
Oxygen: Increased from 1 to 1.5
Weight: Increased from 1 to 3
Melee Damage: Increased from 1 to 1.5
Movement Speed: Increased from 1 to 1.2
Fortitude: Increased from 1 to 3

content.title: Custom Decay System Explained
content.text:
New Players: Start with a 14-day decay timer, meaning your structures and dinos are safe for two weeks from your last login before decay begins.

Discord Verified Members: Enjoy an extended decay timer of 60 days after verifying through Discord.

Click the button below on Verify to complete your verification through Discord.


Checking  Decay Time:

If you want to check the decay timers of your structures or those of others, simply stand close to the structure and look at it. Then, type the command /decaytime in the chat to view the remaining time.

content.title: Points
content.text:
Once you are verified, you will start earning points based on your playtime. 

You’ll receive these points every 5 minutes. These points can be used in our in-game shop. For more information, check the  Shop tab

content.title: In-Game Points Shop – Commands & Info
content.text:
PC Players: Press F2 in-game to open the shop interface.

Console Players: The in-game interface is not available for consoles, but you can use commands to access the shop. Check out the commands below.

On our Discord, you can find a channel where all items are listed along with the commands you need to use.


Shop Commands:
/shop
 to see the first 20 items in the shop. Each item will display its name and ID – remember these for easy purchasing.

To view more items, use 
/shop 2, /shop 3,
 etc., to browse the next set of 20 items.

 Buying Items:
Purchase items using 
/buy [ItemID] [Quantity]
.
Example: 
/buy AdvancedRifleBullet 1
 to buy one stack of Advanced Rifle Bullets.
A quantity of 1 refers to one full stack (if the item is sold in stacks).


 Checking Your Points:
See your current points balance with 
/points


Trade points:
/trade <'insertplayernamehere'> <insert amount here>
 

 Selling Items:
Sell items back to the shop using 
/sell [ItemName] [Quantity]

Example: 
/sell seeds 1
 to sell 10 seeds.


 Viewing & Buying Kits

 View Kits:
See available kits with 
/kit


 Buying Kits:
Purchase a kit using 
/kitbuy [KitName]

Example: 
/kitbuy StarterKit
 to buy the Starter Kit.

 Claiming a Kit:
Claim your purchased kit with 
/kit [KitName]

Example: 
/kit StarterPt
 to claim the StarterPt kit.

content.title: Level Up with Our Quest System!
content.text:
Complete quests and advance through the ranks: Initiate, Hunter, Tamer, Explorer, Builder, Dominator, and finally Ascendant. Each level increases your point earnings, with Ascendants receiving 12 points every 5 minutes and enjoying a 10% discount in the store!

There are also various quests available, including daily, weekly, and progression-based quests that you complete by playing. For more information, on PC, press F3 to open the quest console, or access it via the radial menu and select the quest symbol.


Quests Overview

The Survivor's Ascension: The Initiate
Requirements:
Collect 2000 Wood
1000 Stone
500 Fiber
Rewards:
New rank: Initiate
100 points


The Survivor's Ascension: The Hunter
Requirements:
Kill 100 wild dinos
Kill 5 rex
Collect 1000 raw meat
Collect 1000 Hide
Rewards:
New rank: Hunter
300 points


The Survivor's Ascension: The Tamer
Requirements:
Tame 75 wild dinos
Tame 5 Dodo's
Tame 2 Rex
Rewards:
New rank: Tamer
500 points

 The Survivor's Ascension: The Explorer
Requirements:
Play for 1500 Minutes (25 hours)
Collect 10 Rare Flower
Collect 50 Black Pearl
Collect 500 Obsidian
Rewards:
New rank: Explorer
500 points

The Survivor's Ascension: The Builder
Requirements:
Craft 30 Stonewall
Craft 15 Stone foundation
Craft 15 Stone pillar
Craft 5 Large plot
Craft 1 Raft
Rewards:
New rank: Builder
500 points

The Survivor's Ascension: The Dominator
Requirements:
Kill 1 Boss
Kill 5 Alpha Rex
Kill 1 Alpha Mosa
Kill 10 Alpha Megalodon
Kill 50 random alphas
Rewards:
New rank: Dominator
500 points

The Survivor's Ascension: The Ascendant
Requirements:
Kill 1 Alpha Overseer
Rewards:
New rank: Ascendant
500 points
